name: Implement Feature from Specification
description: Create a new feature based on a detailed specification
template:
Implement the following feature:

Specification: {{SPECIFICATION}}

Requirements:
- Follow existing code patterns
- Add appropriate error handling
- Include unit tests
- Update documentation if needed

Start by analyzing the codebase structure and then implement step by step.

name: Add Unit Tests for Component
description: Create comprehensive unit tests for a component
template:
Add unit tests for {{COMPONENT_NAME}}.

Test Coverage:
- {{TEST_SCENARIOS}}

Use the existing test framework and patterns. Ensure edge cases are covered.

variables.name: COMPONENT_NAME
variables.description: Name of the component to test

variables.name: TEST_SCENARIOS
variables.description: List of test scenarios to cover

name: Debug Failing Test
description: Debug and fix a failing test
template:
Debug the failing test: {{TEST_NAME}}

Error: {{ERROR_MESSAGE}}

Steps:
1. Reproduce the failure
2. Identify root cause
3. Fix the issue
4. Verify the fix
5. Ensure no regressions

name: Security Review for Authentication Flow
description: Perform security review of authentication implementation
template:
Perform a comprehensive security review of the authentication flow.

Focus Areas:
- Authentication mechanisms
- Session management
- Password handling
- Token security
- Rate limiting
- Input validation

Provide detailed findings and recommendations.

name: Explain System Architecture
description: Get detailed explanation of system architecture
template:
Explain the system architecture for {{COMPONENT}}.

Include:
- Overall design
- Key components and their interactions
- Data flow
- Integration points
- Design decisions and rationale

name: Refactor Code for Readability
description: Refactor code to improve readability and maintainability
template:
Refactor the following code for better readability:

File: {{FILE_PATH}}

Goals:
- Improve code clarity
- Reduce complexity
- Follow best practices
- Maintain functionality
- Add comments where needed
